name: To Kill a Mockingbird: Trial Game
name_original: To Kill a Mockingbird: Trial Game
description:
A game where player's play as Atticus Finch in a short gameplay recreation of the trial in Harper Lee's "To Kill a Mockingbird". Test your knowledge of the trial chapters in the book to find all the evidence in favor of Tom Robinson's defense.

How to Play:

Click  through questions in the order in which they are asked in the book to find all the evidence.
